dt: {bc}the realization of a meaning in a single word or morpheme rather than in a grammatical construction
{bc}the treatment of a formerly freely composed, grammatically regular, and semantically transparent phrase or inflected form as a formally or semantically idiomatic expression

shortdef: the realization of a meaning in a single word or morpheme rather than in a grammatical construction
the treatment of a formerly freely composed, grammatically regular, and semantically transparent phrase or inflected form as a formally or semantically idiomatic expression
